Actions.Name: Overpower
Actions.AreaEffect: All foes adjacent to the knuckle take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Crushing Advance
Actions.Description: Dash 1 space, then shove all adjacent characters 1 space.

Actions.Name: Taunt
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 must save or be shoved towards the knuckle as far as possible, then gain hatred of the knuckle. On a successful save, they are shoved 1 towards the knuckle.
